about_the_game:
Maze TD Battleground is a grid map based tower defense (TD).

Maps feature checkpoints and end zones. Enemies will spawn in waves and cross the checkpoints in order to get to the end zone. Your goal is to prevent them from ever reaching the end zone by placing your towers. Enemies will evade towers as long as they have a free way to get to the end zone. Use this feature to build elaborate mazes that the enemies have to traverse.

Make use of the checkpoints to have enemies recross your mazes multiple times and increase damage. Make sure not to block their path completely or they will start destroying towers until they can reach their target again.

The game is released in version 1.0.0 and features:
  • Towers with various attack types
  • Towers with aura effects
  • Upgrades for towers
  • One game mode in three difficulties
  • Multiple maps to play
  • Map editor

The expected play time is 2-4 hours.
